item.title: Tailscale Webhook
item.description: [Tailscale] is really good. I’ve been using it as a virtual private network to span 2 home networks and to securely (!) access my hosts when I’m remote. Recently Tailscale added Webhook functionality to permit processing subscribed-to (Tailscale) events. I’m always a sucker for a webhook ;-) I had some problems getting Tailscale’s “Test endpoint” to POST events to my mashup (see below) server. So, here’s a curl equivalent: URL="" # Webhook URL https://{machine}.
